Chunyu He

Biography

Chunyu has been a PhD student at the Spike Lab since Sepetmber 2025, conducting his doctoral research under the supervision of Prof Tiejun Huang. His research primarily focuses on developing more efficient algorithms to reconstruct the sharp image from the spike data.

Education

  • "University of Science and Technology of China: Bachelor of Computer Science and Technology (2021-2025)"
